author: RTÉ News
title: China raises Wuhan virus death toll
description: The Chinese city where the coronavirus first emerged raised its death toll by 50%, revealing the epicentre of the global pandemic had been much worse hit than Beijing had previously reported.
content:
The Chinese city where the coronavirus first emerged raised its death toll by 50%, revealing the epicentre of the global pandemic had been much worse hit than Beijing had previously reported. 
The revision came as a growing chorus of world leaders suggested … [+4541 chars]
